extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by retrieving the installed PAN-OS version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is the firewall configured with a URL filtering profile with blocked categories assigned to a security rule with a source zone that has an external facing interface?

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Vulnerable URL Filtering Configuration
extracted_playbook.description: Remove the URL filtering policy with blocked categories assigned to a security rule with a source zone that has an external facing interface to prevent exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Wait for and Install Fixed Version of PAN-OS
extracted_playbook.description: Do not enable any protections if using Aporeto software. Wait for and install a fixed version of PAN-OS software.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which zone protection mitigation to apply?

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Packet-based Attack Protection
extracted_playbook.description: Enable packet-based attack protection including both TCP SYN with Data and Strip TCP Options for TCP Fast Open in the Zone Protection profile for Zone A.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Flood Protection with SYN Cookies
extracted_playbook.description: Enable flood protection with SYN cookies in the Zone Protection profile for Zone A with an activation threshold of 0 connections.
